job description:
Job Summary

Title: Full Stack Developer/Data Scientist

Duration: 6 months long term

Location: Dallas, TX

Summary:

We are looking for a Full Stack Developer/Data Scientist with 7 + years of experience. The candidate should be strong in Python, Java, microservices, node .js, angular.js, expression.js. (mean stack) . The

Programming: Node.js, Python, Rest API, bokeh

Environment: Atlassian BitBucket, iTrack JIRA, command line git, CDP, Docker, Kubernetes

AI as a Service: Azure Cognitive Services, QnA Maker, TTS, STT, LUIS, MS Bot framework (open source)

Ideal working locations are Dallas/Plano or Austin, TX

Additional AI skills:

Topic modeling (e.g., LDA)

Job Type: Contract

Experience:
  • Full stack: 7 years (Required)
  • Node.JS: 5 years (Required)
  • Java: 7 years (Required)
